amendment.description: An amendment to increase support for infrastructure improvements at tribal colleges and universities, with an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2819 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2819 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S11404-11405; text: CR S11404) An amendment to increase support for infrastructure improvements at tribal colleges and universities, with an offset.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2819 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Dorgan.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2819 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
